main event: A witness reported a sighting of a bright red light in Kettering, Ohio on April 21, 1968.
interesting points: The witness noted that the red light was observed in the northwest sky and appeared to get closer before disappearing., The object seemed to move quickly and made sharp turns., The weather was clear during the sighting., The witness estimated the object to be about the size of a penny held at arm's length., The sighting lasted approximately 15 minutes and involved a total of one witness.
